description:
* Immaculate Unit Offering Exceptional Value
* Owners New Property Now Ready - Bid Now- this property can sell at anytime.
* Rarely available 2 Bed Apartment !

Welcome home to 10/179 Weyba Road located within the South Pacific Resort. The purchasing process of this property is via Openn Negotiation as an Online Auction - An Auction with conditions accepted.

Boasting a modern 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom unit with 2 car secure parking. This unit is being sold fully furnished. 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom units with double parking are rare to come by so be sure to get in quick as this opportunity won't last long.

Main Features include:
- Elevated Ground floor location near front of complex for quick and easy access
- Modern & open plan living, dining & kitchen
- 2 large bedrooms, both with fans and built in robes; master with ensuite.
- Main bathroom and internal laundry
- Ducted A/C throughout
- Wrap around balcony
- Hardwood timber floors throughout
- Good sized kitchen with modern appliances and electric cooktop
- Fully Furnished- inventory list available on request
- Body corp fees approx $2185/quarter

An Upscale, fully furnished apartment is now available for you to permanently occupy, holiday let, lease or have as your own Weekender. In this freshly painted & immaculately maintained resort you may indulge in the Noosa spa next door, cabanas, 4 huge pools (2 heated), 3 jacuzzis, sauna, Pilates, table tennis, full sized tennis court, bbq's & convention centre & an on site restaurant, all set among 5 acres of manicured, tropical gardens & water features.

Luxuriate in salon treatments, massage & room service. Next door to the resort are local grocers, shopping centres, restaurants, cafes and more. Across the street stroll along the Noosa River to Gympie Terrace Boutique shopping & dining precinct with its sandy river beaches & boating activities. Moments drive to Noosa Springs Golf Resort, Noosa Junction, Hastings Street, Noosa Surf Beach & National Hiking Parks. All this and less than 30 minutes to the airport!

Continued Capital Growth expected with the advent of the Sunshine Coast International Airport & numerous industries & projects growing in the region. Reasonable body corporate (with a carefully managed healthy sinking fund) includes insurance, grounds staff & maintenance. Unlike many other resorts, units in South Pacific have separate water, electricity meters and private mailboxes.

Go to https://www.openn.com.au/ and register to Bid. For sale by Openn Negotiation (flexible conditions online auction). The Openn Negotiation is under way and the property can sell at any time. Contact Rob or George immediately to become qualified and avoid disappointment. Open to all buyers, including finance, subject to seller approval.

Disclaimer
This property is being sold by auction or without a price and therefore a price guide can not be provided. The website may have filtered the property into a price bracket for website functionality purposes
